item.title: Check for buttons
item.description: Identify the 7 buttons on the content toolbar (the toolbar is located above the page displaying help pages): Go Back, Go Forward, Home, Show in table of contents, Bookmark document, Print Page, and Maximize

item.title: Back
item.description: Click the Back button in the content toolbar. This should reload the previous document (Workbench).

item.title: Forward
item.description: Click the Forward button in the content toolbar. This should reload the document ("Installing new features with the update manager").

item.title: Maximize
item.description: Click maximize icon on the toolbar of the main content frame. This should maximize that particular frame, and "Restore" icon should be shown in place of "Maximize". This time double click on the toolbar, it should restore the original layout. The behavior should be similar to that of the eclipse views.

item.title: Show in TOC
item.description: Click on the "show in TOC" button on the toolbar. This should highlight the "Installing new features" topic in the navigation tree.

item.title: Print
item.description: Print the topic by clicking on the "Print Page" button on the toolbar. This should launch the system print dialog and if you click OK it should print the help page

item.title: Bookmark
item.description: Bookmark the current page, by pressing the "Bookmark document" button on the toolbar.

item.title: Verify Bookmark
item.description: Turn to the Bookmarks tabs and verify the bookmark has been added there.

item.title: Select another topic
item.description: Turn to the Contents tab and select another topic.

item.title: Open from bookmark
item.description: Turn to the Bookmarks tab and click on the bookmarked topic. This should load that topic in the main content area.

item.title: Remove the bookmark
item.description: With the bookmark selected, click on the 'Remove' icon in the toolbar.

item.title: Remove the bookmark with 'Delete'
item.description: Create another bookmark. Select it in the Bookmarks tab and press the 'Delete' button on your keyboard.

item.title: Add and delete bookmarks
item.description: Add more bookmarks, delete them all using "Remove all bookmarks" button or action on the pop-up menu.
